Header: Police investigates into havoc at Immigration and Emigration Department
Content: According to the police, investigations are currently underway with regard to the persons who behaved in an unruly manner within the Immigration and Emigration Department, demanding to grant citizenship to Politburo member of Frontline Socialist Party Kumar Gunaratnam. A senior spokesman at the Maradana Police told our news team that the investigations will focus on the damage caused to the property of the Immigration and Emigration office. Meanwhile, Propaganda Secretary of the Frontline Socialist party Pubudu Jayagoda stated that he is waiting for the team of police officers conducting investigations under the Public Property Act to meet the party members. A tense situation occurred during the protest demonstration staged by the Frontline Socialist party in front of the Immigration Emigration office in Colombo yesterday.
